decks.notes: This deck focuses on controlling the board through removal spells and disruptive creatures. It aims to slow down the opponent's game plan by utilizing cards like Wrath of God and Skyclave Apparition. The deck also features ways to disrupt the opponent's graveyard strategies with cards like Relic of Progenitus. Additionally, the inclusion of March of Otherworldly Light and Karn, the Great Creator provide additional ways to control the battlefield. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to outlast the opponent while steadily gaining control over the game.

The deck relies on using non-land cards to generate mana and control the opponent's plays while setting up a win condition with Goblin Charbelcher. By using cards like Lotus Bloom and Tameshi, Reality Architect, the deck can quickly build up mana to power out its combo pieces. Additionally, cards like Sink into Stupor and Whir of Invention provide additional disruption to control the game state. The main goal is to assemble the combo pieces and win the game without needing to rely on traditional lands.

The deck aims to quickly generate mana and chain together spells to cast a lethal Grapeshot spell, dealing a large amount of damage to the opponent in one turn. It focuses on generating red mana through cards like Ruby Medallion and rituals, while also utilizing Ral, Monsoon Mage to draw cards and control the game. The deck also includes cards like Wish and Valakut Awakening for additional flexibility and consistency in executing the combo. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of spells and finish them off in a single explosive turn.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying aggressive threats like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler to pressure the opponent. It utilizes efficient burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to clear the way and deal direct damage, while also leveraging cards like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge to pump up its creatures for extra damage. The deck aims to maintain a fast pace and close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize, using cheap spells and card selection to maintain momentum.

This deck focuses on assembling a variety of creatures to combo off and overwhelm the opponent. Using cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Chord of Calling, it can search for specific creatures to fit the situation. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician provide additional value and removal options while Boseiju, Who Endures helps protect key spells from counterspells. The toolbox approach allows for versatility in dealing with different matchups, while the inclusion of cards like Grist, the Hunger Tide and Malevolent Rumble offer additional win conditions.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quickly overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. Key cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah help to establish an early board presence, while Goblin Bombardment provides reach and removal. Phage, Titan of Fire's Fury serves as a powerful finisher, and cards like Thraben Charm and Static Prison help disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, allowing the deck to execute its game plan efficiently.

The deck focuses on using Eldrazi creatures and ramp spells to control the game and overwhelm opponents with powerful threats. Utilizing cards like Ugin, Eye of the Storm and All Is Dust, the deck aims to disrupt opponent's strategies while efficiently ramping up mana with cards like Utopia Sprawl and Ancient Stirrings. Karn, the Great Creator provides additional utility by tutoring for artifacts, while Sowing Mycospawn and Malevolent Rumble offer additional control and disruption. The deck's win conditions include big Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker.

The deck is focused on quickly milling the opponent's deck, using cards like Hedron Crab, Ruin Crab, Fractured Sanity, and Archive Trap to fill up their graveyard while also disrupting their game plan with Fatal Push and Drown in the Loch. Visions of Beyond and Tasha's Hideous Laughter provide card draw and potential win conditions, while Surgical Extraction can remove key cards from the opponent's graveyard. The deck also includes land destruction with Field of Ruin and a variety of fetch lands to thin out the deck and ensure consistent mana fixing.

The deck aims to quickly assemble the combo of Broodscale Bloodchief and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate massive amounts of mana and deal lethal damage to the opponent. It uses cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Kozilek's Command to control the board, while also utilizing cards like Ancient Stirrings and Urza's Saga to search for key combo pieces. The combination of Eldrazi Temple and Walking Ballista allows for additional mana generation, and cards like Malevolent Rumble and Emrakul, the Promised End provide alternative win conditions. The deck also includes support cards like Grove of the Burnwillows and Cavern of Souls for additional utility.
